# Uso de métodos estatísticos a fim de explorar ouro no território brasileiro

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

## Bibliotecas
```{r, warning=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(foreign)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(geostats)
data("earthquakes")
```

## Limpeza do banco de dados

```{r}
dados = earthquakes %>%
  filter(year==2020) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat")) %>%
  st_set_crs(4326)

asia_bbox <- st_as_sfc(st_bbox(c(xmin = 25, ymin = 5, xmax = 150, ymax = 50), crs = 4326))

# Filter points within Asia
asia_only <- dados %>%
  filter(st_intersects(geometry, asia_bbox, sparse = FALSE))

# Create a leaflet map
leaflet(data = asia_only) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add base map tiles
  addCircleMarkers(
    radius = 4,               # Size of markers
    color = "blue",           # Marker color
    stroke = FALSE,           # No border for markers
    fillOpacity = 0.8         # Transparency
  )
```
